title: Sportlight Cards
description: A gradient border with rounded corners applied to any div or text, enhancing content with a colorful, stylish edge

body.raw:
<Tabs defaultValue="preview" className="w-full relative">
  <TabsList>
    <TabsTrigger value="preview">Preview</TabsTrigger>
    <TabsTrigger value="codesnippet">Code</TabsTrigger>
  </TabsList>
  <TabsContent value="preview">
    <ComponentPreview
      basicPadding={true}
      name="gradientBorder"
      category="carousel"
    />
  </TabsContent>
  <TabsContent value="codesnippet">
    <CodeWrapper noExpand={true}>
      <CodePreview name="gradientBorder" category="carousel" />
    </CodeWrapper>
  </TabsContent>
</Tabs>

#### Usage

```css title="global.css"
@property --border-angle {
  inherits: false;
  initial-value: 0deg;
  syntax: '<angle>';
}
```

```ts title="tailwind.config.ts" {5,8-10}
tailwind.config = {
  theme: {
    extend: {
      animation: {
        border: 'border 4s linear infinite',
      },
      keyframes: {
        border: {
          to: { '--border-angle': '360deg' },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}
```
